Class LoginControl

    LoginControl Class which guides the customer until the he/is logged in.

    • Method Detail

      • startingChoice

        public void startingChoice()
        Method which displays the welcome screen and asking if the customer wants to either Register or Log-In. Then the system connects to the customer to the respective path. In case the customer enters not 1 or 2, the system will state an invalid choice and prompt the user again to enter 1 or 2 for an infinite amount of times. Void method
